import React from "react"; import { BsTwitter } from "react-icons/bs"; import { ImLocation } from "react-icons/im"; import { FaLink } from "react-icons/fa"; import { HiOutlineBuildingOffice2 } from "react-icons/hi2"; const UserCard = ({ data }) => { return (

{data?.name || "not found"}

Joined {data.created_at.slice(0, 9) || "yoyoy"}

{data.login || "yoyoy"}

{data.bio || "yoyoy"}

Repos {data.public_repos || "yoyoy"}
Followers {data.followers || "yoyoy"}
{" "}
Following {data.following || "yoyoy"}

{data.location || "yoyoy"}

{data.twitter_username || "yoyoy"}

{data.blog || "yoyoy"}

{data.company || "yoyoy"}

); }; export default UserCard;
